TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChangeConflictException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: Thrown when an update fails because database values have been updated since the client last read them.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following example shows how this exception might be used for returning information about a concurrency conflict.
## Examples [!code-cs[System.Data.Linq.ObjectChangeConflict#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/objconflict/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.ObjectChangeConflict#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/objconflict/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Specifies the exception of which is a result.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifies a message to explain the exception, and specifies the exception that caused this exception.
